articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of KPA Military Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of KPA Military Band
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, enjoyed a concert marking the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA Military Band.
					 When he entered the auditorium, the performers and audience enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and deepest thanks to him.
					
					 Through the concert the performers clearly showed the firm faith and resolution and indomitable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to accomplish without fail the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The band's solemn sound and dynamic, appealing and militant melody truthfully represented the ideological and mental world and invincible spirit of the heroic KPA advancing along the road indicated by the party, flying the red flag of the WPK as the first colors of the revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the band's successful concert and warmly congratulated all its members on its 70th founding anniversary.
					
					 He recalled that the band has covered a glorious road, arousing the service personnel and people to developing the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK and building a rich and powerful country for the past seven decades since it played military music at the inaugural ceremony of the Pyongyang Institute founded by President Kim Il Sung as the nation's first central cadre-training base after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il repeatedly guided concerts of the band, developing the military music into the militarized one and the world's leading one, he noted, adding that the band has grown to be the nation's first military band, Juche-based revolutionary band and a group of buglers speaking for the stand of the Korean revolutionaries.
					
					 The band is like the face of the state, symbol of the KPA and a powerful weapon instilling revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit into all the service personnel and people, he stressed.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the Party Central Committee to win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche with the band in the van of the revolutionary ranks playing military music more loudly, he noted.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be carried out by the band and took necessary measures.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials, creators and musicians of the band.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol and service personnel.

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued the following crucial statement on Tuesday:
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are making desperate efforts after being taken aback by the first successful H-bomb test of Juche Korea and its successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					 As the hysteric farce for adopting resolutions on "sanctions" at the UN, madcap military moves for stifling the DPRK with all type nuclear weapons and all unprecedented "options" against the DPRK could not break the will of the DPRK, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have now turned to their last gambling.
					
					 That is the "collapse of social system" through "beheading operation" targeting the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces' nuclear-powered submarine North Carolina has already entered Pusan Port, F-22A Stealth fighter-bombers have been deployed in the Osan air force base and special operation troops of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are finding their way to south Korea one after another to get involved in the operation.
					
					 The first special warfare corps of the U.S. Army, 75th commando regiment, special commando regiment of the U.S. marines, 720th special tactics corps of the U.S. air force, special warfare team Seal and other special operation troops have already been deployed in fields. Their operation missions are to strike major strategic targets including the supreme headquarters and nuclear and strategic rocket force bases of the DPRK in wartime.
					
					 Never has there been such a time as now when almost all the special operation troops of the ground force, navy, marines and air force of the U.S. that earned an ill fame in the past overseas aggression wars, and the aggression troops that go operational for the so-called "high-density strike" have found their way to south Korea all at once.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces openly bluster that they will examine the feasibility of the combined "beheading operation", a key program of new OPLAN 5015, and the "removal operation" of nuclear and strategic rocket forces of the DPRK at the upcoming Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					
					 The "beheading operation" touted by the enemies means a preemptive strike for "removing in advance the one empowered with the mandate of order" to deter the "use" of the nuclear and strategic rockets of the DPRK.
					
					 Gravity of the situation is that the south Korean puppet forces are frantically joining the gangster-like U.S. in the implementation of "beheading operation," not content with introducing nuclear war means of the U.S. into south Korea to kill the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The above-said "beheading operation" and the moves to "bring down the social system in the DPRK" are the height of hostile acts against it.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK regard the supreme headquarters of our revolution as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are ready to immediately and mercilessly punish without slightest leniency, tolerance and patience anyone provoking the dignified supreme headquarters even a bit.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army clarifies the following principled stand reflecting the will of all the angry service personnel and people to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the enemies in view of the situation that has reached the dangerous phase which can never be overlooked any longer:
					
					 From this moment all the powerful strategic and tactical strike means of our revolutionary armed forces will go into preemptive and just operation to beat back the enemy forces to the last man if there is a slight sign of their special operation forces and equipment moving to carry out the so-called "beheading operation" and "high-density strike."
					
					 Our primary target is the Chongwadae, the centre for hatching plots for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, and reactionary ruling machines.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors has long been disqualified to live in this land as it has recklessly introduced nuclear war means of its U.S. master to bring a nuclear disaster to this land, desperately decrying the DPRK's nuclear deterrent and successes made in space development, treasures common to the Korean nation. 
					
					 The group will have to pay a very high price for its high treason to get the sun eclipsed and destroy the cradle of our life. 
					
					 If the enemies persist in their foolish military action, failing to come to their senses despite the DPRK's crucial warnings, the DPRK will stage the second striking operation to totally eliminate its very source.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' bases for invading the DPRK in the Asia-Pacific region and the U.S. mainland are its second striking target. 
					
					 The Korean-style striking operation which has been in the making for several decades for the final battle against the U.S. imperialists, robbers, will be an unimaginable retaliation war and reduce the cesspool of all evils to ashes never to rise again on our planet.
					
					 They should bear this in mind. 
					
					 The DPRK is possessed of the most powerful and ultra-modern strike means in the world which are capable of dealing fatal blows at the U.S. mainland any moment and in any place.
					
					 There is no need for the DPRK to keep secret about its military capabilities for which it has exerted all efforts to fight decisive battles with the U.S. for more than half a century. 
					
					 The U.S. is fated to be punished and perish in the flames due to the DPRK's deadly strikes.
					
					 The doom of the U.S. has been sealed.
					
					 Its strongholds for aggression are within the range of the DPRK's strikes and its weaponry is ready to open fire.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to make the final choice: Whether they are to face merciless punishment or opt for making apology, though belatedly, and putting the situation under control.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish and reckless than trying to make the sun sink.
					
					 The DPRK's service personnel and people who are like manifold fortresses protecting the supreme headquarters of the revolution will mercilessly frustrate any provocation of the hostile forces and dash forward more dynamically for the final victory of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Tuesday on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK; Alexei Bartusov, Russian military attache; and other Russian embassy officials and foreign military attaches here.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the Russian embassy was placed before the Liberation Tower. The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army before going round the tower.
					
					 Then the Russian embassy officials placed a wreath and flowers before the cemetery of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang City.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Spring Concert Given
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Spring Concert Given
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- There took place the 2016 DPRK-China friendship spring concert at the Moranbong Theatre Tuesday under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, the Ministry of Culture of China and the Chinese embassy here.
					 Among the audience were DPRK Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Ambassador Li Jinjun and staff members of the Chinese embassy here, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here, Chinese guests staying in the DPRK and Chinese residents in the DPRK watched the concert.
					
					 Speeches were made before the concert.
					
					 Artistes of the Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China staged diverse numbers such as folk orchestra "Lunar new year's day overture", instrumental trio "Moon over the riverside with flowers in spring" and female solo "Beautiful country with proud sons and daughters".
					
					 They successfully represented the patriotic will, national emotion and feelings of the Chinese people through classical melodies, rich voices, peculiar timbre and refined ensemble.
					
					 They put on the stage folk orchestras immortal classics "Nostalgia" and "Where Are You, Dear General?" and other music pieces reflecting reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Their repertoire also included world famous music pieces.

articles.title: Greetings to Brunei Sultan
articles.content:
Greetings to Brunei Sultan
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan of Brunei Darussalam, on its national day.
					 Saying that he is pleased to see the friendly relations between the DPRK and Brunei Darussalam developing on good terms, Kim wished the sultan good health and bigger success in his responsible work and the Brunei people steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Guyanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to David Arthur Granger, president of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					 Expressing the belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Guyana would grow strong as required by the new era, Kim wished the president bigger success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Greetings to Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan, head of state and minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed the belief that the exchange and cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries would grow stronger and wished the sultan good health and greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Accedes to Space-related International Agreements
articles.content:
DPRK Accedes to Space-related International Agreements
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK acceded to the agreement on the rescue of astronauts, the return of astronauts and the return of objects launched into outer space and the convention on international liability for damage caused by space objects on February 22, Juche 105 (2016), according to the decision of its government.
					 The agreement concluded on April 22, 1968 stipulates the issue of handing over to the launch nation any astronaut, space objects and their parts as they fall or are discovered in the territorial land and waters of a signatory country and open sea.
					
					 The convention concluded on March 29, 1972 undertakes a launch nation to make responsible compensation when space objects caused human or property losses on the earth surface or caused damage to a plane in flight.
					
					 The DPRK's accession to the agreement and the convention will further promote the international trust in space scientific researches and activities and make positive contributions to strengthening cooperation with other countries.

articles.title: DPRK Education Commission Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Education Commission Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Education Commission headed by Chairman Kim Sung Du returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the 10th International Conference on Higher Education held in Cuba.

articles.title: 31st Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology Opens
articles.content:
31st Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology Opens
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The 31st Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology was opened with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 More than 120 achievements contributable to putting the national economy on a Juche, modern, scientific and IT basis are presented to the festival by teachers, researchers and postgraduate students of the university.
					
					 The festival is divided into seven panels including machine, IT, metal and mining. It will involve presentation, exhibition and exchange.
					
					 Hong So Hon, president of the university, made an inaugural address at the ceremony.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the venue of the festival.

articles.title: Success Achieved in Building Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
articles.content:
Success Achieved in Building Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3
Paekam, February 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the North Hamgyong Provincial Brigade of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade are proving successful in the building of the generators room of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3.
					 They have wound up the wall concrete tamping of the substructure of the room in a short span of time.
					
					 This made a breakthrough towards bringing earlier the day of the completion of the power station.

articles.title: New Wind-powered Generator Developed
articles.content:
New Wind-powered Generator Developed
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A new wind-powered generator was developed by the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory in the DPRK as part of the efforts to utilize natural energy.
					 The new generator is smaller, weighs lighter than existing ones and has new mechanism.
					
					 The factory also succeeded in developing a new battery charger, which can work well at a low current generated by weak wind.
					
					 According to Jo Kwang Il, a developer of the factory, told KCNA that the new generator and charger have proved highly efficient in generation of electricity and its conversion.

articles.title: Preparations for Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to cultivating saplings in the DPRK, with the approach of the tree-planting day (March 2) as an occasion.
					 The Central Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection has tended 70 species of saplings for spring tree planting.
					
					 It expanded the cultivation area by 1.8 times and prepared 540 cubic meters of humus, 1 000 cubic meters of sawdust and rice chaff each and 900 tons of peat.
					
					 The nursery, which was visited by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, is playing a big role in turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 Sapling cultivation has also been encouraged at nurseries in South Hwanghae, Jagang, North Phyongan and other provinces.

articles.title: Turtle Ship, World's First Iron-clad Warship
articles.content:
Turtle Ship, World's First Iron-clad Warship
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The turtle ship was the world's first iron-clad warship built by Korean people, which showed off its great power in sea battles against Japanese invaders during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).
					 Its prow was shaped like a head of dragon and its hull and poop were covered with testudinate iron-clad, which resembled a turtle in shape. At that time, the ship was able to withstand any gunfire.
					
					 As its iron-clad was stuck with awls and daggers, it was impossible for the enemies to climb on it.
					
					 The turtle ship was armed with scores of cannons and could fire in every direction through loopholes. And it was propelled by 10 oars on each side and could also take out a sail at a high speed.
					
					 The turtle ship, which antedated the first European iron-clad ship by nearly 200 years, sank a number of enemy battleships during the war.
					
					 Drama "Admiral Ri Sun Sin" has been recently put on the stage in Pyongyang to deal with a great devotion made by Admiral Ri (1545-1598) to building the ship.

articles.title: Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed
articles.content:
Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies issued an indictment on Feb. 23 disclosing the miserable human rights situation and human rights abuses by the U.S. and western countries which are styling themselves "human rights champions".
					 The indictment referred to the fact that the political freedom and right, the most valuable right of the human being, are being seriously violated in the U.S. and western countries.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are mercilessly trampling down and cracking down the freedom of the religion of other nations and are not properly guaranteeing elementary human right to existence and socio-economic rights.
					
					 In the U.S. and western countries human rights to work are denied and a lot of children are suffering from poverty, left without any state and social care and protection and women are subject to all sorts of insults and discriminations.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are desperately spreading their decadent and reactionary ideas and culture by using all media in disregard of the requirements of the international law on human rights calling for respecting the freedom of thinking and cultural diversity in other countries. 
					
					 They are encroaching upon the essential right of human beings to receive safe and trustworthy news by spreading misinformation.
					
					 The U.S. is patronizing the dissident organizations in other countries and zealously egging them on to bring down their governments. Not a few countries of the West are helping the dissident bodies of other countries to make the situation in the relevant countries unstable and bring about regime changes by providing such bodies with funds, etc.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are wantonly violating the international laws for preventing and punishing massacres under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. has long shamelessly perpetrated such human rights abuses as tapping not only phone messages in its country but those of heads of governments of other countries.
					
					 Recalling that the world is now in the grip of the worst refugee crisis in history, the indictment noted that this is an inevitable product of the policies for domination, hegemony and interference pursued by the U.S. and western countries for meeting their own avarice and interests.
					
					 The issue of refugees being spawned by the U.S. and western countries is a human rights abuse, the indictment said, adding: To put this crisis under control and ensure the rights of the refugees is the obligation and duty of the U.S. and western countries under international laws.
					
					 However, they are evading their responsibilities for them and seriously violating the rights of the refugees.
					
					 Their hideous human rights abuses are now being institutionally committed due to their government's policies and they can be settled only when a genuine system for ensuring human rights is established.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries, tundras of the human rights and cesspools of the human rights abuses, had better stop painting themselves as "human rights champions" and talking about the human rights situation in other countries and mind their own businesses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Principle of Giving Priority to Self-development
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Principle of Giving Priority to Self-development
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Self-development is a powerful weapon for building a thriving nation, and the final victory of the revolution lies in the road of strenuous efforts. This is a steadfast faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					
					 Self-development is a powerful treasured sword for building a thriving nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The principle of giving priority to self-development means the deep awareness and trust that the strenuous efforts are the first in the revolution and construction and the steadfast determination and will to strengthen the strenuous efforts and solve all problems by relying on it.
					
					 Only when strong is the will to strengthen one's own, one can create everything from scratch and build up the invincible national power while racing against time.
					
					 Self-development, the ideological and spiritual source, helps the revolutionary people achieve prosperity of the country with their redoubled efforts, not being carried away by the already achieved successes.
					
					 Their self-development is an invincible power based on the great Juche idea and the most powerful strength whose full play is to be given by the harmonious whole of Marshal Kim Jong Un and all service personnel and people.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have successfully translated into practice the plans and determinations of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. Their self-development is stirring up the whole world as they make redoubled efforts in the great era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Only when all service personnel and people get united around Kim Jong Un in single mind and dynamically advance under the uplifted banner of the self-development-first principle, the great victory will be achieved and the greatest heyday of building a thriving nation opened in the run up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan for Working Hard to Usurp Tok Islets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan for Working Hard to Usurp Tok Islets
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Every Feb. 22 an event for observing "Takeshima (Tok Islets) Day" takes place in Shimane Prefecture, Japan. It is for remembering Feb. 22, 1905 when the Japanese imperialists issued the 40th "notice of Shimane Prefecture" in which they included Tok Islets of Korea in the prefecture.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says that such event is a despicable farce in which a handful of the Japanese reactionaries get together to assert that Tok Islets are part of the territory of Japan.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 However desperately Japan may resort to such a ridiculous farce claiming "its dominium over Tok Islets," the islets which are part of the inviolable territory of Korea can never belong to Japan.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves only arouse criticism and ridicules from the world people and prove that Japan is indeed a very shameful country.
					
					 The 40th notice of Shimane Prefecture touted by Japan is little short of a dead paper not known much to the world.
					
					 Japan annually holds an event for observing the "Takeshima (Tok Islets) Day" after secretly faking up the 40th "notice of Shimane Prefecture." It is aimed to create the international climate favorable for usurping Tok Islets with arms in the future while building up the world public opinion that the islets are part of Japan's territory.
					
					 The present times do not allow those countries hell-bent on usurping the land and invading other countries such as Japan to go at will.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should properly face up to the prevailing times.

articles.title: U.S. Is Tundra of Human Rights: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Is Tundra of Human Rights: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Two men shot each other to death after their quarrel in San Francisco, California State in America and a shooting spree occurred in the crowded cabaret in Florida State, leaving two dead and 10 others wounded. In January there took place shooting sprees in Seattle City, Washington State and Denver City of Colorado State, causing many casualties.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 These facts show that the U.S. is a cesspool of crimes and tundra of human rights. It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. politicians don't care whether the weak are killed by the strong or the poor are exploited by the rich but they highly praise the happenings as a "model of freedom and democracy".
					
					 Irony is that these politicians are finding "fault" with human rights situation of other countries, not concerned about their poor human rights records. 
					
					 There is an old saying: He that has no shame has no conscience.
					
					 The U.S. styling itself a "superpower" shamelessly pulls up other countries over their human rights situation while shelving its own human rights abuses. 
					
					 This hypocritical behavior of the American politicians is disgusting, indeed.
					
					 The U.S. unreasonable and self-contradictory approach towards the human rights issue only brings bitter shame to it.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly know that it is wise for it to look into its position as the world worst human rights abuser and get rid of it before accusing others.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Violent Act Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Violent Act Protested
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The "All-People Measure Committee for Complete Recovery of Peasant Paek Nam Gi and Denunciation of Violence" comprising at least 100 organizations is waging a foot march to denounce the brutal violence by the puppet group.
					 The organization that started Posong, South Jolla Province on February 11 goes round different areas.
					
					 Its members who arrived in Taejon on February 20 marched the city and held a rally in front of the girl peace statue.
					
					 On February 21, 100th day since Paek fell by the fascist clique's violence, the organization held a rally before the building of the Teajon City Office and demanded a probe into the truth about the situation, punishment of those responsible and dismissal of the director of the Police Agency.

articles.title: Humiliating "Agreement" Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Humiliating "Agreement" Rejected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a news conference in Seoul on Feb. 19 rejecting the humiliating "agreement," insult to the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The organization held that the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery reached between south Korea and Japan at the end of last year paid no heed to the demands of the victims though they should be reflected in it as the most important matters.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Japan claimed that the "agreement" was "final and irreversible," a violent statement, the organization charged.
					
					 Recalling that a lot of women who had been hurled into battlefields at the time of war are still missing, the organization declared that the south Korean authorities' promise not to criticize Japan in the international community for the issue not properly settled is an insult to the victims.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in different countries on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 They were held by the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and branch groups of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism from Feb. 12 to 15.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician and great master of the world politics as he developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and put the dignity and might of the DPRK on the highest level with his Songun politics, making great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il built the Workers' Party of Korea as the true mother party faithfully serving the people and laid a solid foundation for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The chiefs of branch groups of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism also lauded his exploits.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on Feb. 12 and 13 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). They included a meeting and opening ceremony of photo, book and handicraft exhibition in Bulgaria, photo and book exhibition in Romania and photo and book exhibition and film show in Bangladesh.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and photos and books introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK ushering in a heyday in building a thriving nation and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Films shown included a Korean film documenting the leadership feats of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of the Bulgarian Communists Union, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, the Socialist Party of Romania, the Romania-Korea Friendship Association and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and masses.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign parities and organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Communist Party of Venezuela posted an article titled "Life for future" illustrated with his photo on Feb. 12.
					
					 The article praised him for dedicating his all to bringing about the prospering future of the DPRK while remaining true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 His noble image will always remain in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive people, it said.
					
					 On the same day, the Nepal Journalist Association, the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association posted articles praising the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu under such titles as "On the 74th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "Songun revolutionary leadership" accompanied by a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy also posted an article supporting the peace-loving policy of the DPRK on Feb. 1.

articles.title: Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting for Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Sofia on Feb. 11.
					 A member of the Executive Bureau of the National Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events and conduct positive activities for solidarity with the Korean people in 2017 in which fall the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 100th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: DR Congo Personage Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
DR Congo Personage Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, released a statement on Feb. 13 hailing the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 This time the Korean people registered great scientific and technological success again under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 There is Kwangmyongsong-4 of socialist Korea in space.
					
					 This is a great pleasure to us.
					
					 Through the success made by the unyielding Korean people we keenly feel that the people can meet all challenges and work a miracle when they are united closely around their leader.
					
					 We express our admiration at the superb leadership ability Kim Jong Un showed in the work to reunify Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will always make success as they are firmly united around the leader.

articles.title: Thai Organization Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Thai Organization Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand made public a statement on Feb. 12 to hail the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK's success in the lift-off of Kwangmyongsong-4 into its orbit is an exciting event to be specially marked.
					
					 The successful satellite launch is a great pride of the Korean nation as it is a token of the greatest respect of the Korean people for leader Kim Jong Il and their sincerity.
					
					 Remarkable events have taken place in the DPRK one after another as it has developed by itself, not depending on foreign forces.
					
					 All the achievements made by the DPRK defying ordeals would be unthinkable without the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK will make more successes in the same spirit and mettle as displayed in succeeding in the satellite launch.
					
					 We send firm solidarity to the Korean people, fully supporting the DPRK's satellite launch as an exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereign state.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de banda militar de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de banda militar de EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el concierto dedicado al septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion de la banda militar del EPC.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al asiento, los ejecutantes y espectadores le dieron gran bienvenida en testimonio de la maxima gloria y el mas calido agradecimiento hacia el.
					
					A traves del concierto, los ejecutantes mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion, voluntad y temperamento de los militares y civiles coreanos de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu, uniendose firmemente en torno al Mariscal.
					
					Las melodias solemnes, alegres, exhortativas y combativas demostraron el mundo ideo-espiritual y el impetu del heroico EPC que avanza solo por el camino recto indicado por el Partido enalteciendo la bandera roja del PTC como primer estandarte de la revolucion.
					
					El Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido un magnifico concierto y felicito a todos los integrantes de la banda militar del EPC que acogio el aniversario 70 de su fundacion.
					
					Durante 70 anos desde cuando la banda militar del EPC interpreto la primera musica militar en la ceremonia inaugural de la Escuela de Pyongyang, fundada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung como primera base central de formacion de los cuadros del pais despues de la liberacion de Corea, dijo y apunto que la banda militar ha venido por la trayectoria orgullosa llamando vigorosamente al ejercito y pueblo a la lucha por el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas y la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio con frecuencia el concierto de la banda militar para desarrollar nuestra musica militar como musica de caracter militar y combativo y de  talla mundial, recalco y prosiguio que bajo la atencion de los grandes Lideres antecedentes, la banda militar del EPC se ha  convertido en el primero hijo mayor del pais, en la banda jucheana y revolucionaria y en el colectivo de trompeteros que representan la posicion de los revolucionarios coreanos.
					
					Subrayo que la banda militar del EPC es la cara del Estado, el simbolo del EPC y el arma poderosa que infunde a los uniformados y civiles el animo revolucionario y combativo.
					
					Asevero que es la decision ferrea del Comite Central del PTC alcanzar la victoria final de la empresa revolucionaria del Juche al poner la banda militar del EPC al frente de la fila revolucionaria para que interprete mas alta y vigorosamente la musica militar.
					
					El Mariscal dio las tareas asumidas ante la banda militar y tomo las medidas necesarias.
					
					Y se fotografio junto a los funcionarios, creadores y ejecutantes de la banda militar del EPC.
					
					Lo vieron Kim Ki Nam, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Comandancia Suprema de EPC publica declaracion crucial
articles.content:
Comandancia Suprema de EPC publica declaracion crucial
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 la siguiente declaracion crucial:
					Tan pasmados ante el pleno exito en la prueba de la primera bomba H y el lanzamiento de satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4 de Corea del Juche, el imperio norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos hacen esfuerzos desesperados en estos ultimos dias. 
					
					Al no poder doblegar la voluntad de la RPDC con la adopcion de la histerica resolucion de "sancion" que se orquesta en la ONU, el frenetico aplastamiento militar en que se movilizan los artefactos nucleares y las otras "opciones" sin precedentes contra la RPDC, ellos recurren a la ultima jugada para realizar el "derrumbe del regimen" mediante la "operacion de descabezamiento" apuntando a la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Ya se anclo en el Puerto de Pusan el submarino de propulsion nuclear de tropas norteamericanas North Carolina,  que se movilizara en esa operacion, y se desplegaron en la base aerea de tropas yanquis en Osan los bombarderos de combate Stealth F-22A. Y se introducen sucesivamente en el suelo surcoreano los efectivos de operacion especial de tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					Ya estan emplazados en el terreno los efectivos para la operacion especial inclusive el primer cuerpo belico especial y el 75o regimiento de comando de las fuerzas terrestres de tropas norteamericanas, el regimiento de comando de infanteria de marina, el 720o cuerpo de tactica especial de fuerzas aereas norteamericanas y el equipo Seal del cuerpo especial de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas. Sus misiones operacionales son atacar en el tiempo de guerra a los importantes objetos estrategicos incluyendo la Direccion Suprema y las bases de armas nucleares y cohetes estrategicos de la RPDC.
					
					Por primera vez, casi todas las fuerzas armadas de operacion especial de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, de infanterias de marina y aereas de las tropas agresoras del imperialismo norteamericano, que en el pasado ganaron mala fama en las guerras de agresion al ultramar, y las otras agresivas movilizadas en el "ataque a modo de pinzas", se aglomeran simultaneamente en el Sur de Corea.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos hablan sin titubeo de que durante el tiempo de los ejercicios conjuntos militares "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle 16" a desarrollarse en seguida revisaran la realidad de la "operacion combinada de descabezamiento", articulo principal de la "OPLAN 5015" nuevamente inventada, y de la "operacion de eliminacion" de las armas nucleares y de cohetes estrategicos de la RPDC.
					
					La "operacion de descabezamiento" de que hablan los enemigos, consiste en "eliminar" de antemano al "ordenador" para impedir el "uso" de las armas nucleares y cohetes estrategicos.
					
					Insatisfechos con la introduccion imprudente de los equipos mortiferos de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. para aplastar a los compatriotas, los titeres surcoreanos toman parte en la "operacion de descabezamiento". He aqui la gravedad del caso.
					
					La diabolica "operacion de descabezamiento" y las maniobras encaminadas al "derrumbe del regimen" constituyen el climax de la hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo aprecian mas que su vida la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion.
					
					Castigan inmediata y despiadadamente a todos los que atenten aun en lo minimo nuestra prestigiosa Direccion Suprema.
					
					Con respecto a que la situacion llega a la grave fase que no se puede pasar por alto, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea declara la siguiente posicion de principios reflejando la voluntad de venganza de todos los militares y civiles coreanos irritados:
					
					Desde este momento, todos los fuertes medios de ataque estrategicos y tacticos de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias entraran en el cumplimiento de justas operaciones preventivas destinadas a eliminar completamente con anticipacion los efectivos y armamentos de operaciones especiales de los enemigos que se incorporaran a la "operacion de descabezamiento" y al "ataque a manera de pinzas", en el caso de que estos muestren una minima accion militar.
					
					El primer blanco sera Chongwadae, nido de complots fratricidas, y los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria.
					
					Ya perdio la calidad de vivir en el territorio coreano la banda traidora Park Geun-hye, que calumnia con virulencia nuestro disuasivo nuclear, patrimonio comun de la nacion, y nuestros exitos de desarrollo espacial, e introduce sin razon ni fundamento los armamentos nucleares mortiferos de su amo norteamericano que acarrearan los desastres nucleares a los connacionales. 
					
					Debe pagar el precio mas tragico por sus tremendos crimenes tendentes a ocultar el Sol del cielo y eliminar el terreno de vida de la nacion.
					
					Si los enemigos siguen recurriendo a las memas acciones militares sin tener en consideracion nuestra advertencia importante, entraremos en la segunda operacion de ataque para eliminar completamente la fuente de enfrentamiento.
					
					El segundo blanco de ataque sera las bases militares de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en la region de Asia-Pacifico y el territorio estadounidense. 
					
					El ataque a nuestro estilo, preparado siglo tras siglo para hacer el combate final con el imperialismo norteamericano sera la guerra de venganza inimaginable y convertira en las cenizas todos los nidos de mal para que no se resurjan nunca mas en nuestro planeta. 
					
					Los enemigos deben tener presente que disponemos de todos los medios de ataque sofisticados no vistos y capaces de atacar a nuestras ganas el territorio estadounidense en cualquier momento y en cualquier punto. 
					
					No sentimos la necesidad de ocultar nuestra capacidad militar consolidada mas de medio siglo para hacer el combate decisivo con el imperio americano gangsteril. 
					
					EE.UU. debe recibir nuestro golpe y eliminarse por nuestro fuego.
					
					Esto es el destino fatal de EE.UU. que se enfrenta con nosotros. 
					
					Los nidos de agresion ya estan a nuestro alcance de tiro y ya hemos apretado el percusor de venganza. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben hacer la ultima opcion de aceptar nuestro castigo implacable o pedir perdon y reparar la situacion, aunque sea tarde. 
					
					Sera absurda y estupida la intencion de bajar el Sol del cielo. 
					
					Nuestros militares y civiles, que forman una fortaleza inexpugnable en defensa de la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion, frustraran despiadadamente todas las provocaciones de las fuerzas hostiles y marcharan con mas vigor hacia la victoria final de la potencia Paektusan.

articles.title: RPDC ingresa a acuerdos internacionales alusivos al cosmos
articles.content:
RPDC ingresa a acuerdos internacionales alusivos al cosmos
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ingreso el 22 de febrero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche al acuerdo sobre el socorro y regreso de cosmonauta y la devolucion del objeto espacial y al otro sobre la responsabilidad internacional de danos por los objetos espaciales.
					El primer acuerdo, firmado el 22 de abril de 1968, estipula entregar al pais lanzador en caso de caer un cosmonauta, objeto espacial y su pieza en el territorio y mar jurisdiccionales del pais signatario y la alta mar o descubrirlo, etc.
					
					El segundo concertado el 29 de marzo de 1972, demanda al pais lanzador a responsabilizarse y compensarlo en caso de ocurrir los danos humanos y de bienes en la superficie de la Tierra o sufrir el dano el avion en el vuelo debido al objeto espacial.
					
					Al haber ingresado en dichos acuerdos, la RPDC contribuira mas a fomentar la confianza internacional en la rama de la investigacion de la ciencia espacial y las actividades cosmicas y fortalecer la cooperacion con otros paises.

articles.title: Exito en construccion de Central Heroes Jovenes Paektusan no. 3
articles.content:
Exito en construccion de Central Heroes Jovenes Paektusan no. 3
Paek-am, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los miembros de la brigada de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte registran innovaciones en la construccion de la sala de generadores de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan no. 3.
					Culminaron en un corto tiempo el relleno de pared de la infraestructura de la sala de generadores.
					
					Gracias a los empenos de ellos, se preparo otra brecha para acortar el tiempo de culminacion de la central.

articles.title: Se activa cultivo de posturas de arboles
articles.content:
Se activa cultivo de posturas de arboles
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hacen ingentes esfuerzos por el cultivo de posturas de arboles en visperas del Dia de Reforestacion (2 de marzo).
					En la Almaciga Central del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental ya estan preparadas muchas posturas de arboles de 70 especies necesarias a la plantacion de arboles en primavera.
					
					A base de la cientifizacion, industrializacion y sintetizacion de cultivo de posturas de arboles, la almaciga trazo bien el plan del proceso para el cultivo y organiza en detalles la labor para la preparacion de semillas, materiales, siembra, el abonamiento y el cuidado de cultivos.
					
					Aumento 1.8 veces la superficie del campo de cultivo mas que antes y acumulo en un corto tiempo mas de 540 metros cubicos de humus, mas de mil metros cubicos de aserrin y cascarilla de arroz, respectivamente, y mas de 900 toneladas de turba.
					
					Obtuvo decenas de especies de semillas de arboles en diversas localidades inclusive las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, Jagang y Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					Los tecnicos hicieron de manera cientifica la salpicacion de abonos y productos agroquimicos para elevar la proporcion de radicacion de posturas.
					
					La susodicha almaciga visitada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es una base de cultivo de posturas de arboles que se encarga de una cuota importante en la forestacion de todo el pais.

articles.title: Minju Joson aconseja a EE.UU. arreglar primero sus quehaceres domesticos
articles.content:
Minju Joson aconseja a EE.UU. arreglar primero sus quehaceres domesticos
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, hubo disparos entre personas al cabo de una querella en San Francisco del Estado de California de Estados Unidos, lo que  dejo dos muertos. Tambien ocurrio un repentino tiroteo en un lugar de diversion del Estado de Florida, donde estaban conglomeradas muchas personas, dejando como saldo 2 muertes y 10 heridos. En enero pasado se produjo un tiroteo sangriento en Seattle de Washington y en una ciudad de Colorado causando muchas bajas.
					En un comentario individual de hoy, el periodico Minju Joson senala que tales hechos testimonian que Estados Unidos es el reino de crimenes y la escena caotica de violacion de derechos humanos, y prosigue:
					
					Los politiqueros norteamericanos involucrados en las actividades estatales dan espaldas al hecho de que los fuertes matan a los debiles y los ricos explotan a los pobres. Al reves, lo encomian como "modelo" de la "libertad" y la "democracia".
					
					Lo ridiculo es que esos politiqueros se entregan solo a buscar los "defectos" en "DDHH" de otros dando vista gorda a la situacion tan pobre de su pais. 
					
					Es tan asquerosa la actitud arrogante de los politiqueros del pais norteamericano, autodenominado como "superpotencia", que suelen hablar con preferencia de la situacion de DDHH de otros paises.
					
					El proceder irracional y contradictorio de EE.UU. es una estupidez igual a manchar a su cara.
					
					Antes de ordenar a otros, Estados Unidos debe arreglar primero sus quehaceres domesticos al examinar bien su situacion calificada como reino criminal y pais represivo de DDHH.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza ambicion de Japon de usurpar islote Tok
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza ambicion de Japon de usurpar islote Tok
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Japon celebra el 22 de febrero de cada ano como "Dia de Takeshima" (islote Tok) insistiendo en no olvidar ese dia de 1905 en que los imperialistas japoneses promulgaron el "anuncio no. 40 del departamento de Shimane" sobre la "admision" del islote coreano Tok en el departamento japones de Shimane. 
					En un comentario individual de este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica el acto por "Dia de Takeshima" de una farsa grosera y continua:
					
					Por mas que Japon insista en la "posesion del islote Tok", este sagrado territorio coreano no puede ser el japones. 
					
					La farsa de los reaccionarios japoneses provoca gran repudio de los pueblos del mundo y demuestra que Japon es un pais cinico. 
					
					El "anuncio no. 40 del departamento de Shimane" no pasa de ser un documento fantasmal e incognito. 
					
					Japon desarrolla cada ano el acto por "Dia de Takeshima" con el malsano intento de inducir en error a la opinion publica como si el islote Tok fuera el territorio japones y de preparar el ambiente internacional favorable a usurparlo con armas. 
					
					Japon debe tener presente que en la epoca actual no pueden actuar a sus caprichos los enloquecidos por la ambicion de usurpacion del territorio y de agresion a ultramar.
